experience.description: Lead development of graphics and display drivers for Intel integrated GPU platforms, focusing on performance optimization and power management.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented graphics driver optimizations resulting in 25% performance improvement
Developed power management features reducing GPU power consumption by 30%
Led cross-functional team of 5 engineers in driver architecture redesign
Collaborated with hardware teams on silicon bring-up and validation
Mentored junior engineers on driver development best practices
achievements: Shipped driver updates to over 100M devices worldwide
Received Intel Achievement Award for outstanding performance

experience.description: Developed system software and media processing solutions for Intel platforms, focusing on hardware acceleration and performance optimization.
responsibilities: Implemented media processing pipeline with hardware acceleration
Developed hardware abstraction layer for cross-platform compatibility
Created automated testing frameworks for driver validation
Optimized video encoding/decoding performance using SIMD instructions
Collaborated with firmware teams on hardware interface specifications
achievements: Contributed to 3 patent applications for media processing innovations

experience.description: Entry-level position focusing on embedded systems development and hardware integration for IoT and edge computing platforms.
responsibilities: Developed firmware for embedded IoT devices
Implemented device drivers for various sensors and peripherals
Created board support packages for new hardware platforms
Participated in hardware bring-up and validation activities
Wrote technical documentation and user guides
achievements: Successfully brought up 5 new embedded platforms
Completed Intel New Graduate Training Program with distinction

experience.description: Summer internship focusing on driver development and system optimization for Intel graphics platforms.
responsibilities: Analyzed graphics driver performance bottlenecks
Implemented performance monitoring tools
Conducted benchmarking and validation testing
Contributed to driver debugging and issue resolution
Presented findings to engineering leadership
achievements: Identified and fixed critical performance regression
Developed automated testing script adopted by team

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

timeline_highlights.title: Promoted to Software Engineer
